arts.ttl: Bristol City fight back for draw at Swansea
arts.sum: Bristol City fought back to deny Swansea victory in an entertaining 1-1 Sky Bet Championship draw in rain-soaked South Wales.

arts.ttl: Bristol City player ratings vs Swansea City: Jason Knight comes to rescue and impresses in draw
arts.sum: The winger struggled to link-up play on the left wing in the first half but grew into the game and was a real threat during the second period. Hit the post in the first half and should’ve scored early on in the second half having been denied by Vigouroux following a powerful run into the box.

arts.ttl: Championship boss calls for VAR to be introduced after Swansea City controversy
arts.sum: Bristol City chief Liam Manning wants the Championship to introduce Video Assistant Referees after a 1-1 draw between his side and Swansea City on Sunday

arts.ttl: Swansea City player ratings as duo colossal and star everywhere vs Bristol City
arts.sum: The Swansea City player ratings from their 1-1 draw with the Robins

arts.ttl: Swansea City 1-1 Bristol City: Swans denied third straight league win in entertaining contest
arts.sum: Swansea City were held 1-1 by Bristol City at the Swansea.com Stadium

arts.ttl: Jason Knight rescues a point for Bristol City at Swansea
arts.sum: Ben Cabango opened the scoring for the Swans in contentious circumstances.
Jack Ogalbe has looked over the Championship action on Tuesday and Wednesday and provided a score prediction for each match

arts.ttl: Swansea City v Bristol City live: Kick-off time, TV channel and score updates
arts.sum: Swansea City host the Robins at the Swansea.com Stadium this afternoon

arts.ttl: Bristol City predicted team vs Swansea City: Manning to face selection headache over decisions
arts.sum: Meanwhile Yu Hirakawa will be pushing for a place in the starting XI after an impressive cameo off the bench last week against the U’s saw him play vital roles in both of the Robins’ second-half goals. City will go into the fixture full of confidence as they produced an impressive comeback win against Manning’s former side Oxford United last week.

arts.ttl: Haydon Roberts outlines Bristol City dressing room's ambitious Championship prediction
arts.sum: Haydon Roberts believes Bristol City should be pushing for the play-offs this season as the dressing room have their say over the Championship ambitions. Bristol City Live is now on WhatsApp and we want you to join our community.
